page.title: 01INTRODUCTION NESTON, WIRRAL
page.content:
This area is situated on the {Wirral peninsular. } The primary land cover is{farmland. The secondary cover is residential.
The{residential areas}include part of Parkgate, Neston, Thornton Hough,Raby and Gayton.{Parkgate and Neston}are part of Cheshire.{Gayton, Raby}and {Thornton Hough}are part of Merseyside.
The main{amenities}in{Neston}are the Comprehensive School, the Recreation Centre, the Industrial Site and Marconi.{Parkgate}and{Neston}are {dormitory suburbs}for{Merseyside. } { {Thornton Hough}is a{planned village built about 100 years ago by Lord {Leverhulme.}There are{two churches, one with five clock faces and the other built as a Norman replica.
